## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                            | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `apikey`   | `apikey`   | Drop SDK Key                           | `string`  | `''`    |
| `dev`      | `dev`      | Flag to enable testnet mode            | `boolean` | `false` |
| `multiple` | `multiple` | Flag to enable multiple wallet support | `boolean` | `true`  |
